abstract: Rhapsody said on Monday that it has signed an agreement to acquire Napster from Best Buy, uniting two cloud music players amid escalating competition in a growing market.
snippet: Rhapsody said on Monday that it has signed an agreement to acquire Napster from Best Buy, uniting two cloud music players amid escalating competition in a growing market.
lead_paragraph: Rhapsody, the subscription digital music service, said on Monday that it had signed an agreement to acquire Napster from Best Buy, uniting two cloud music players amid escalating competition in a growing market.

headline.main: Rhapsody to Acquire Napster in Deal With Best Buy
